entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
